utils

Class CsvRecordSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.CsvRecordSchema

  • public class CsvRecordSchema
extends java.lang.Object
    CsvRecordSchema A class that loads csv records' columns names, types and a short info about each one.
    Since:
    0.1-SNAPSHOT

    • Constructor Detail

      • CsvRecordSchema

        public CsvRecordSchema(boolean rawSchema)
        Constructor. Loads schema from .json file to JSON object.
        Parameters:
        rawSchema - Boolean A boolean that declares if the schema for raw netflow records will be loaded or not.

    • Method Detail

      • parseRecord

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parseRecord(java.lang.String csvRecord)
        Applies the loaded csv schema to a csv record (comma separated). It splits the csv line (by comma) and for each field in the line it adds a record in a map, where the key is the name of the csv column that is represented in this index and the value is the value of this column, parsed o the correct data type.
        Parameters:
        csvRecord - String A comma separated string, which will be handled as a csv line.
        Returns:
        HashMap(String, Object) A map that contains the name of a column and its value converted in the correct data type according to the schema.

      • loadSchemaFile

        public org.json.JSONObject loadSchemaFile(boolean raw)
        Load the csv schema from a .json file into a JSON object. If the schema file cannot be loaded a default schema will be returned.
        Parameters:
        raw - Boolean A boolean, which declares if the schema for raw netflow will be used or not.
        Returns:
        JSONObject A JSON object, which contains all the csv schema.
